post_text: June 19, 2016 at 7:25 PM#1For the purposes of this I have 20 fixtures which I need to manipulate the Dimmer Intensity using 3 presets. DimMax, DimHalf, DimMinI need a bump/wave to travel along these 20 fixtures step by step. I would need to rebuild the sequence again.... boring... and slow if needed on the fly....Is there a way in which I can control a Single Shot effect with the same level of control?Any ideas are appreciated.
